# <img src="readme/icon.png" width="42px" height="42px"/> Recents Shortcut (for Wear OS)

This app is intended to work as a shortcut for the default recents launcher from Wear OS. The app also provides complications...

##
### Features
<ul>
  <li>Shortcut (open the app to launch the recents launcher)</li>
  <li>RecentsIcon (complication / ICON)</li>
  <li>RecentsImage (complication / SMALL_IMAGE)</li>
  <li>RecentsProgress (complication / GOAL_PROGRESS,RANGED_VALUE)</li>
  <li>RecentsText (complication / SHORT_TEXT,LONG_TEXT)</li>
</ul>

##
### Download the lastest apks¹
[![apk](https://img.shields.io/badge/apk-v1.0.0-FBD75B?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://hms-douglas.github.io/Wear-Recents-Shortcut/dist/apk/1.0.0.apk)

¹ All apks listed inside this repository were built by me and are not minified.
